pkgmetadata.longdescription: Linking Singe-Cell Transcriptomes Atween Contemporary Subpopulation Genomes // Given an RNA-seq derived cell-by-gene matrix and an DNA-seq derived copy number segmentation, LIAYSON predicts the number of clones present in a tumor, their size, the copy number profile of each clone and the clone membership of each single cell (Andor, N. Lau, B., et al. (2018) doi:10.1101/445932).
